Scripts.OnValueChanged:
local min, max = self:GetMinMaxValues() if userInput then self:GetParent():SetScrollOffset(max - floor(value + 0.5)) end
self:GetParent().scrollUp:SetEnabled(value ~= min) self:GetParent().scrollDown:SetEnabled(value ~= max)

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetOnScrollChangedCallback(function(self, offset) if not self.scrollBar.userInput then self.scrollBar:SetValue(self:GetNumMessages() - offset) end end)
local function OnClick(button) self:ScrollByAmount(button.direction * 3); end
self.scrollUp:RegisterForClicks('LeftButtonUp') self.scrollDown:RegisterForClicks('LeftButtonUp')
self.scrollUp:SetScript('OnClick', OnClick) self.scrollDown:SetScript('OnClick', OnClick)

Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent() parent.scrollFrame:Fire('OnItemDel', parent, parent.item)
